alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 07 at 7:31PM MST until March 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MST FOR SOUTHERN JUDITH BASIN COUNTY... At 730 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located over Judith Basin county, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 40 and 61. Locations impacted include... Hobson, Windham, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Utica and Benchland. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Wet roadways will quickly freeze. Black ice will cause roads, bridges and overpasses to become slick and dangerous. Slow down and be prepared for sudden loss of traction.
